item.title: R Packages
item.author: M.Smith3@napier.ac.uk (Matthew Smith)
item.description: I have authored a number of R packages, that can all be found on my GitHub page The key packages are: ITNr CompaniesHouse GtR GVTr ITNr This package provides a set of function to clean and process international trade data into a network. It also provides tools to implement various descriptive analysis and plots of the international trade network. This package is also available on CRAN.

item.title: About me
item.author: M.Smith3@napier.ac.uk (Matthew Smith)
item.description: My name is Matthew Smith and I am currently a Lecturer in Strategy at Edinburgh Napier University. My research interests focus on the application of social network analysis to a range of problems in international business and management. These include: Analysis of two-mode and one-mode networks of interlocking directorates Women executives on boards of UK FTSE 350 companies Global production networks and Global Value Chains(GVCs)
